Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Pyrrhocoris defensin (natural AMPs; insects, arthropods, invertebrates, animals, 3S=S; UCSS1)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (75.56%) toinsect defensin CcDef2. mol Ex Coeff: 7415; mol formula: C203H325N62O56S6; mol Wt: 4734.578;Activity: Active against M. luteus, B. megaterium (MIC 0.15-0.3 uM), A. viridans (MIC 0.3-0.6 uM), S. aureus (MIC 0.62-1.25 uM), S. saprophyticus (MIC 1.25-2.5 uM), P. acidilactici (MIC 2.5-5 uM),  B. subtilis QB935 (MIC 2.5-5 uM), E. coli D22 (MIC 2.5-5 uM).
Literature Information.Author: Cociancich S, Dupont A, Hegy G, Lanot R, Holder F, Hetru C, Hoffmann JA, Bulet P. 1994
Literature Information.Title: Novel inducible antibacterial peptides from a hemipteran insect, the sap-sucking bug Pyrrhocoris apterus
